Summary Extensive experience with architecting large scale data-warehousing systems with Oracle.  
Over 13 yrs of experience in production support managing Oracle (8, 8i, 9i, 10g, 11g), MS SQL Server and MySQL.  
In-depth knowledge and experience managing Oracle RAC (10g, 11g), database replication (homogenous & heterogeneous), HA (RAC, Dataguard, Mutli-master replication), parallel processing, database partitioning (table & data sharding), and database performance tuning (SQL tuning and database tuning). 
Sound understanding of Hadoop and methods of loading/unloading data between HDFS and RDBMS systems.

Thorough understanding in designing storage systems (NAS & SAN) for high performance databases.

Summary Seasoned professional with extensive experience in Engagement Management and Program Management of enterprise scale Hadoop based Big Data ecosystem providing Infrastructure and Platform as Service. Prior experience in Service Delivery, Operations Management and Application Development for Oracle ERP based Data Warehouse and Business Intelligence systems for global enterprise implementations. Managed cross-geo global teams and successfully delivered various Process Improvements and Operational Efficiencies. MBA with PMP, ITIL, Six-Sigma Green-Belt.  
 
Program Manage Customer Engagements for Hadoop Grid Services providing Infrastructure-as-a-Service and Platform-as-a-Service on the Multi-Tenant Big Data ecosystem, the 2nd largest infrastructure at Yahoo!, comprising of over 40,000 nodes on 16 clusters across 3 data centers and over 500 PB of data.  
 
Onboarded over 500 projects from different Business Units and Properties across Yahoo! on to the Multi-Tenant Big Data ecosystem, and cross-functional coordination for all Grid Services to these groups spanning Gemini, Flickr, Mail, Search, Ads & Data, Targeting, Personalization, Homepage, Labs and several other organizations. 
 
Program Managed customer validations and migration of the above Hadoop Grid ecosystem in phases from Hadoop 1.0 to YARN based Hadoop 2.x with implementation of High Availability of Namenode, Rolling Upgrade of clusters and several other enhancements. Received award from VP for “Customer Focus” at organization level All Hands. 
 
Crisis & Escalation Management for $85M Oracle Apps 11i ERP IBIS implementation at Sun Microsystems. Managed 5 Corporate Data Warehouse operations for $135M Legacy implementation at Sun Microsystems. Participated in cross functional efforts towards Operational Efficiencies and to streamline effective Service Delivery in Datawarehouse, BI, ERP areas. Developed and Implemented various data warehouse enhancements for Sun ERP Globalization to a single instance of Oracle Apps 10.7. Summary Around 10 years of experience with Oracle, MySQL and SQL Server databases, in architecting, administrating and development roles on Linux, UNIX and Windows platforms. 
Worked with Oracle version 12c, 11g, 10g and 9i on small to very large databases into multi-TBs. 
Lead several Oracle and MySQL migrations and upgrades from various versions between different environments, including versions 11g to 12c, 10g to 11g, and between different patch sets, along with OPatching over several CPUs.
